mapper.insert: insert into STORE_ITEM(ITEM_CODE, ITEM_MENU, ITEM_NAME, ITEM_PRICE) values(#{ITEM_CODE}, #{ITEM_MENU}, #{ITEM_NAME}, #{ITEM_PRICE})

select nvl(max(CART_NUM), 0) + 1 from STORE_CART
insert into STORE_CART(CART_NUM, ITEM_CODE) values(#{CART_NUM}, #{ITEM_CODE})

select nvl(max(PAY_NUM), 0) + 1 from STORE_PAY
insert into STORE_PAY(PAY_NUM, PAY_NAME, PAY_AMOUNT) values(#{PAY_NUM}, #{itemDisplay}, #{totalPrice})
mapper.update: UPDATE STORE_PAY SET pg_token = #{pg_token} WHERE pg_token IS NULL AND PAY_NUM = (SELECT MAX(PAY_NUM) FROM STORE_PAY WHERE pg_token IS NULL)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM STORE_PAY WHERE pg_token IS NOT NULL
select * from STORE_ITEM inner join STORE_CART on STORE_ITEM.ITEM_CODE = STORE_CART.ITEM_CODE
